languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Reaper uses an ability that costs wounds, the Reaper gains half of the cost as temporary wounds. The amount of temporary wounds isn't decreased by the effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

Whenever the Bladedancer uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} gained cannot be decreased by the effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

Whenever the Bladedancer uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} gained cannot be decreased by the effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

Whenever the Bladedancer uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, gana la mitad de las heridas usadas como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. La cantidad de heridas temporales obtenida no cambia aunque se reduzca el coste de la capacidad.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, gana la mitad de las heridas usadas como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. La cantidad de heridas temporales obtenida no cambia aunque se reduzca el coste de la capacidad.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を消費する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用するたび、消費した傷の半分を{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}として獲得する。得られる一時体力の数は、アビリティのコストを減少する効果で減らすことはできない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を消費する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用するたび、消費した傷の半分を{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}として獲得する。得られる一時体力の数は、アビリティのコストを減少する効果で減らすことはできない。

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}使用会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，消耗的一半生命值都会变为{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。获得的临时生命值数量不会由于“降低生命值消耗”的相关效果而减少。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}使用会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，消耗的一半生命值都会变为{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。获得的临时生命值数量不会由于“降低生命值消耗”的相关效果而减少。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui coûte des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, il récupère la moitié des blessures dépensées comme {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}. Le nombre de blessures temporaires gagnées ne peut pas être réduit par des effets réduisant le coût des capacités.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui coûte des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, il récupère la moitié des blessures dépensées comme {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}. Le nombre de blessures temporaires gagnées ne peut pas être réduit par des effets réduisant le coût des capacités.

languages.text: Setzt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} ein, die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} kostet, erhält er die Hälfte der als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} investierten Wunden. Die Anzahl der erhaltenen temporären Wunden kann durch Effekte, die die Kosten von Fähigkeiten reduzieren, nicht verringert werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

traits.locale_text: Setzt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} ein, die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} kostet, erhält er die Hälfte der als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} investierten Wunden. Die Anzahl der erhaltenen temporären Wunden kann durch Effekte, die die Kosten von Fähigkeiten reduzieren, nicht verringert werden.

languages.text: Применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, которая требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} получает половину потраченного здоровья в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Объем получаемого временного здоровья не может быть уменьшен эффектами, сокращающими стоимость способностей.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.

traits.locale_text: Применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, которая требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} получает половину потраченного здоровья в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Объем получаемого временного здоровья не может быть уменьшен эффектами, сокращающими стоимость способностей.

Применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, которая требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} получает половину потраченного здоровья в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Объем получаемого временного здоровья не может быть уменьшен эффектами, сокращающими стоимость способностей.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı harcamasını gerektiren bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullandığında harcadığı bu sağlığın yarısını {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı olarak kazanır. Kazanılan geçici sağlık puanı miktarı, kabiliyetin bedelini azaltan etkiler tarafından azaltılamaz.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain half of the wounds spent as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The number of temporary wounds gained cannot be decreased by effects that reduce the cost of abilities.
